metadata.description: Vue, Nuxt, and NuxtHub skills for AI coding assistants

plugins.name: nuxt-skills
plugins.description: [Deprecated: prefer individual skills] All Vue, Nuxt, and NuxtHub skills bundled together.

plugins.name: vue
plugins.description: Vue 3 Composition API, components, composables. Use when editing .vue files, writing reactive code, or encountering ref, computed, watch, defineProps errors.

plugins.name: nuxt
plugins.description: Nuxt 4+ with server routes, h3 v1, nitro v2. Use when building SSR apps, data fetching, or encountering useFetch, useAsyncData, middleware, hydration errors.

plugins.name: nuxt-modules
plugins.description: Nuxt module development with defineNuxtModule, Kit utilities, hooks. Use when creating modules or encountering module registration, hook, testing errors.

plugins.name: nuxthub
plugins.description: NuxtHub v0.10 database, KV, blob, cache APIs with Drizzle ORM. Use when working with Cloudflare storage or encountering D1, hubDatabase, hubKV errors.

plugins.name: nuxt-content
plugins.description: Nuxt Content v3 collections, queries, MDC rendering. Use when building markdown-based sites or encountering queryCollection, content rendering errors.

plugins.name: nuxt-ui
plugins.description: Nuxt UI v4 components with Tailwind Variants theming. Use when building styled UI or encountering UButton, UModal, UForm, UTable component errors.

plugins.name: nuxt-better-auth
plugins.description: Auth with @onmax/nuxt-better-auth, useUserSession. Use when implementing authentication or encountering session, OAuth, route protection errors.

plugins.name: reka-ui
plugins.description: Reka UI headless Vue components, accessible primitives. Use when building accessible UI or encountering asChild, controlled state, DialogRoot errors.

plugins.name: document-writer
plugins.description: Writing documentation and blog posts with MDC. Use when creating markdown content or needing style guidance for technical writing.

plugins.name: ts-library
plugins.description: TypeScript library authoring with tsdown/unbuild. Use when publishing npm packages or encountering exports, type inference, build config errors.

plugins.name: motion
plugins.description: Motion Vue (motion-v) animations, gestures, scroll effects. Use when adding animations or encountering motion component, useAnimate, layout transition errors.

plugins.name: vueuse
plugins.description: VueUse composables for state, browser, sensors, network. Use when needing utility composables or encountering useMouse, useStorage, useAsyncState errors.
